Algorithms

Class ShortestPathAlgo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithms.ShortestPathAlgo

  • public class ShortestPathAlgo
extends java.lang.Object
    A department that receives a collection of robots and fruits and computers The optimal route so that all the fruits will be "eaten" as quickly as possible - this is the central algorithmic department and includes the calculation of "fruit tracks" for each of the producers.
    Author:
    Efrat Cohen and Odelia Hochman
